p: Fortification of edible products (e.g., food, food constituents, or supplements) with nutrients or non-nutrient bioactive components can help to balance the total nutrient profile of a diet and supplement nutrients lost in processing and thus to correct or prevent insufficient nutrient intake and associated deficiencies [ 1]. Compounds of natural origin, such as curcumin (CUR) occurring in turmeric, Ï‰-3-fatty acid in fish oil, vitamins from fruits, when encapsulated in an appropriate nanocarrier, will be released after consumption of the food in the target organ and utilized according to its nutritional property [ 2].
